titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to assist States with a high unemployment rate under the equity bonus program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/23/2009--Introduced. Revises requirements for the equity bonus program for specified federal-aid highway programs for FY2010-FY2015 with respect to any state with an unemployment rate equal to or exceeding 12% at any time during FY2009. Increases from 92% to 105% the percentage for such a state of the total fiscal year apportionments for the programs.
